Detailed Description

template<class Socket>
class UHttpClient< Socket >

Creates and manages a client connection with a HTTP server.

HTTP stands for Hyper Text Transfer Protocol, which is defined by RFCs published by the Internet Engineering Task Force.

A UHttpClient instance can make only one HTTP request (although this one request may involve several message exchanges if HTTP redirection or authorization is involved). However, HTTP 1.1 introduces persistent connections which can make more effective use of TCP/IP.
